title: Horam
html: HORAM(Hoʹram).King of Gezer; one of the 31 kings defeated by the Israelites under the leadership of Joshua during the conquest of the Promised Land. Horam and all his host were killed when they came to the aid of Lachish at the time of Joshua’s campaign against that city.—Jos 10:33; 12:7, 8, 12, 24.
